headline: About Us
body:
Chico Encalada's goal is to provide high quality, freshly made food at a reasonable price.
We provide a variety of mexican food for our diverse community.
Our mission is to spread the taste of South America throughout Washington D.C metro area.

headline: Location&Hours
body: Location 3423 M St NW, Washington, DC 20007, Hours of Operations, Monday - Thursday (9am - 8pm). Friday & Saturday (12pm - 12am). Sunday (12pm - 6pm), Come Checkout our authentic mexican food at our Food Truck located in Washington D.C metro area.
